text: Ernesto Zardini (born 1908, date of death unknown) was an Italian ski jumper. He competed in the individual event at the 1932 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1908 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Italian male ski jumpers Category:Italian male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Italy Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Italy Category:Ski jumpers at the 1932 Winter Olympics Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1932 Winter Olympics Category:People from Cortina d'Ampezzo
title: Ernesto Zardini
